body.name: Thetis Pro FIDO2 Security Key, Two-Factor authentication NFC Security Key, Dual USB Ports Type A & Type C for Multi Factored Protection (HOTP) in Windows/MacOS/Linux, Gmail, Facebook, Dropbox, GitHub
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 37 mins
features: Security Passwordless: FIDO2 certified which support U2F protocol with the latest Chrome on Windows,Linux, OS, Gmail, Facebook, Dropbox, GitHub,Two-Factor Authentication for protect
The Thetis Pro FIDO2 Security Key is an all-purpose multi-factor authentication security key that will provide passwordless protection, NFC compatibility, and HOTP with exclusive dual USB ports.

Work well with both USB-A and USB-C ports and Near Field Communication, the NFC tech means that instead of plugging it in, you can just tap the key against the right devices to activate the authentication.

Highly Durable: 360° rotating metal cover, extremely secure and durable, usb security keys are tamper resistant, water resistant, and crush resistant. Provide low-cost and simple solution with high security.
Small and portable: Easily fits on your keychain and requires no battery or network connectivity, its high quality body stands up to life's little dings

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 258 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: NFC Ready, Dual Ports USB A & USB C

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specification Standard: FIDO2, FIDO U2f, HOTP Interface: USB-A, USB C, NFC Algorithm: ECDSA, SHA256, HMAC Material: Aluminum Alloy and PC Browser: Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Opera Operating System: Windows, macOS, Linux, Chrome OS

DUAL USB PORTS USB-A / USB-C ports for various devices NFC COMPATIBLE NFC compatibility for connectivity with mobile devices. Strong Security Protect your online account security with advanced 2nd Factor Authentication.

FOR VARIOUS Services More security for various online accounts that support FIDO2, U2F, and HOTP. Folding Aluminum Design Protected by durable Aluminum Alloy shield. CARRY-ON CASE A carry-on case to latch onto a pocket for protection.
Note: The Thetis Security key is exclusively compatible with BofA's web version of the financial banking system; it does not work with the app-based version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, versatile, buy two
reviews.reviewText: Everything's moving to 2FA where I work and I accidentally cracked my phone's screen. While we have coverage for that, it has to be shipped off so I ordered one of these as a backup to the Duo mobile app. Until everything is USB-C, having both A and C *and* NFC all in one durable metal package is a no-brainer. Most of the other brands aren't that flexible and look cheaply made.Buy two (Apple requires it) and keep the second one in a secure place in case the first one goes missing.These aren't thumb drives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to figure out but totally worth it
reviews.reviewText: Once you get this figured out, it is amazing. I use Windows 11 plus 1Password. The instuctions for utilizing the Security stick were difficult for me but that may be because I had no clue what I was doing to start. After figuring out I needed to first connect it up to Windows Hello Security 2 factor authentication and then tell 1Password for Windows (not Edge or Chrome browser extensions) to boot off of Windows Hello, it is fantastic. It really makes using a password manager a joyful experience almost as easy as the face recognition on my iPad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Security Key and work with Apple ID Login
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A few weeks ago, one of my accounts got hacked by someone. The person just placed an order. I contacted the website customer service to cancel the order and my bank to decline the transaction and replaced my card. I feel that I have to use more secure methods to help keep my accounts safe. After updated iOS 16.3, Apple ID support security keys (they need 2 key’s when registered). This key works great. That is really nice. I like the keys a lot because of that the key has both USB A and USB C as well as NFC. Great products, highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad instructions; can't get it to work
reviews.reviewText: It's well built and looked like it would be usable. Unfortunately, the instructions are VERY unclearly written (actually put into a YouTube video running at 3X speed) that even when you step through them slowly, give directions that do not match the Windows 10 / Google software that I'm using. Wasted about an hour trying to figure out how to get it to work, and came to the conclusion that it doesn't really solve any of my security concerns anyway; it's just one more layer of security that is cumbersome to use and not worth the expense or the effort. In addition, caused my computer to lock up requiring a reboot. Returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars USB-A and USB-C
reviews.reviewText: Works as expected as a FIDO2 Level 1 security key. Registered successfully as passwordless authentication method with Entra, Google Suite and other services. Having USB-A, USB-C and NFC connectivity makes it compatible with practically everything under the sun.The only drawback is the bulkiness. This is quite a bit larger than the Yubico Security Key that I got at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It took care of my issue immediately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything was OK, but instructions are very poor (not only the written one also video -video very good for mac users but very poor for windows users)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good, sadly the NFC didnt work.
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a backup for my Yubikey 5, sadly the nfc didn't work making it useless for my Iphone. Besides that the web software isn't the best but for a backup when you don't know if you'll need usb c or b, this is the key for you
Facil e manejar en los ajustes de pc

reviews.reviewTitle: Thetis Chiave di sicurezza Pro FIDO2, autenticazione a due fattori, chiave di sicurezza NFC
reviews.reviewText: Ottimo prodotto, la pendrive viene riconosciuta all'istante su qualsiasi PC in cui l'ho inserita. Affidabilissima, ora diciamo che mi sento più tranquillo avendo impostato la PASSKEY per gli account più importanti. In realtà ne ho comprate 2, avendo ascoltato il consiglio di un noto Youtuber che lo ritengo SERISSIMO. Qualità prezzo be direi che per quelle che mi sono costate, ne vale certamente la pena, in confronto ad un furto di credenziali ed i danni economici derivanti. Per me qualità prezzo validissime. Consigliata per chi come me spesso e volentieri compra online. La penna è corredata da una custodia BELLISSIMA ed ACCATTIVANTE, ne piccola ne grande ma il giusto che non stona neanche appesa ad un portachiavi (cosa che NON CONSIGLIO) ma giusto per dare l'dea.

reviews.reviewTitle: securite absolue avec Thetis Clé de sécurité Pro FIDO2
reviews.reviewText: une fois bien configuré la Thetis Clé de sécurité Pro FIDO2 est excellente plus aucun acces a aucun de mes compte sans la cle
très bien comme clé de sécurité
